sentences.english: Worker mobility gives the tech industry fluidity, velocity, and energy.

sentences.english: Your company is a leading dealer in import and export of hi-tech instruments in China.

sentences.english: Nowadays people look to technology as an alternative source of satisfaction.

sentences.english: Prior to GSR, Sonny was the co-founder of Asia Wireless Technology Corp.
